Title: Sharepoint (WSS 3.0, MOSS 2007) Reference Samples
Description: A project that contains Sharepoint (WSS 3.0, MOSS 2007) Reference Samples including Custom Site Definition Feature, Custom List View Web Part Feature, List Event Receiver Feature with Feature Receiver, and Custom Theme Feature.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A project that contains SharePoint (WSS 3.0, MOSS 2007) Reference Samples including Custom Site Definition Feature, Custom List View Web Part Feature, List Event Receiver Feature with Feature Receiver, and Custom Theme Feature.

Requirements
- Sample Personal Site for Anonymous Access that includes a Contact Us Form SharePoint List with email notification - Custom Site Definition Feature
- Sample Team Site (Intranet) that includes Company Department Sites, an Employee Directory with associated Employee Birthday Web Part(This Months Birthday's) and Employee Service Year Web Part (This Month's Anniversary's), and Department Employee Listing. - Custom Site Definition Feature
- Custom List View Web Part Feature that demonstrates an EditorPart, WSPBuilder Web Part and Solution Installer Setup
- List Event Receiver Feature with Feature Receiver
- Custom Theme Feature
- Twitter Web Part (using XML Web Part and XSLT)
- Generic RSS Consumer Web Part (using XML Web Part and XSLT)
